reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, particularly noting it's suitable for hot summer weather, and appreciate its soft material and lovely color, with one customer noting the pockets don't bulge out.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Decade maxi dress stylish, flattering, and comfortable all at once. The fit is beautiful, the material feels high quality, and I received so many compliments wearing it. Read more
items.author: Janel Bell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the color of this dress!
items.body: I bought the color "green white leaflet" which is true to the the color in the photo on line. It is also true to size, and the fabric is good quality - not too thin. I needed to shorten it, but that's OK; too long I can fix - too short and I would have had to send it back. The style is great for covering my figure flaws while looking elegant enough for any dressy situation. I have bought several of these types of dresses from different brands, and this is one of the best quality dresses I've gotten. They are so comfortable too! Read more
items.author: Practcle1

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tastefully simple
items.body: Lightweight, breathable fabric. It's not 100% cotton, but a cotton blend. Simple , but stylish dress that can be worn casually or dressed up with a cute heel and accessories. Pockets that lay relatively flat. Scoop neck, short sleeves. The dress is true to size with some slight flexibility, it's made to be loose, and somewhat flowy. It's very comfortable. I was able to purchase at a decent price so I received the mustard, gray and black one. Like the length. I purchased size medium and I'm hippy. 5'2 135lbs. Read more
items.author: El'Jaie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommend it
items.body: Beautiful dress especially for the money very comfortable and soft and fit amazingly Read more
items.author: Pamela Harper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars No regrets, it’s perfect.
items.body: Not sure what dress others received but the one I got is fabulous. The material is great quality, it is not sheer or thin and the weight of the fabric allows it to drape beautifully. I’m 5’6 and I saw other reviews about it being too long, I have no complaints about that but then again I prefer a long dress to be exactly that. The recommended size for me was large but after reading reviews I went with the x-large and it fits perfectly. It is my new go to favorite Read more
items.author: Fiona1970

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress but very long
items.body: This dress is great and comfy but unfortunately I have to return it! I’m 5’2 and even with wedge shoes I was tripping over it. It’s WAY too long! Read more
items.author: kristen plevell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars IT HAS Pockets!!!
items.body: It fits amazing. Comfortable and it has pockets. I was asked by many where i brought it and I shared the link. The photo shows me in the black one. I have to take one with this dress too! Lol Read more
items.author: Kisha Fernandez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it!
items.body: Loved the color, it fits right and because I am tall, it was long enough which was surprising. I bought it in other colors. Easy to wear, and good quality. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 3-bean Paste Red, 3-floral Yellow Green Leaf, 1-purple Gray, 2-army Green, 1-wine Red White Small Flowers, 3-pink Wavy Stripes, 1-flower Khaki, 4-flower Wine Red, 4-flower White, 1-black, 1-purple Yellow Chrysanthemum, 4-flower Yellow Black, 1-rapeseed Petals, 3-red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
